verbs.description: [ARG0: Former U.S. President Carter] [V: gave] [ARG1: the commencement address] [ARGM-LOC: at Liberty University] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] , [C-ARG1: where he cracked a lighthearted joke about the crowd size being larger than President Trump 's last year] .
